name: Rainbow Warriors
description:
Rainbow Warriors is an arena game playable from 2 to 4 players created during the Ludum Dare 31. The theme was "Entire game on One screen".

The goal is to kill the others in order to up your combo points. When your combo reach 500 points. You can choose to remove one of the 4 colors present in the arena. When all the colors are gone, the game is ended.

You can play with 2 controllers and two players on keyboard the controls are explained in the help section in the main menu.

Credits:
Developed and created by: abclive, Arkhane
Sprites: Gosti, abclive
Sounds: Arkhane
Music: Mizuki's Last Chance - Yeah copyrighted under (CC BY-ND)

Thanks for playing!
